row.entry: This module is an artistic feature which simulates the grain of a film.

sect3.title: Usage
sect3.para: The grain can be obtained on different channels and with different rendering.

sect4.title: channel
sect4.para: Set the channel you want to work on. Hue, saturation or lightness are available.

sect4.title: coarseness
sect4.para: Set the grain size, which has been scaled to simulate an ISO number.

sect4.title: strength
sect4.para: Set the strength of the effect.
